website_summaries.verdict: A sleek, inexpensive, and toasty wetsuit jacket that sports a cozy fit that will easily keep your shielded from the cold and UV rays while you’re having fun on the water.
pros: Available in multiple sizes, from small to XXXL
Thick and soft material for extra warmth
cons: This model’s slim-fit style isn’t for everyone

customer_reviews.title: this was perfect even though they say they should be tight
customer_reviews.text: I am a women and weigh 180lbs height 5 foot 8. I ordered the mens because they are longer and fit to a T. not to tight and not to loose. The women come up to fare so do their pants. this was perfect even though they say they should be tight. I didn't want my fat stomach sticking way out there. I wore it in the Mexico and the water was cold but was not.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Stump

customer_reviews.title: A great value, well-made for constant use
customer_reviews.text: Buy one size larger, and you have the perfect snorkeling top. Not too thick/warm for Hawaiian waters, and it’s SPF 1000, no UV gets through. I wear this several times a week, and find it durable and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Waikiki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect at keeping hubby warm in 76 degree water.
customer_reviews.text: Over the years my husband has seldom swam in our in-ground pool because it is not heated. He is very sensitive to the cold 76-80 degrees the water is often at. A year ago I had the brilliant idea to buy him Neoprene trunks. That got him in to the waist. Today we tried this Lemorecn wet suit jacket. Wish I would have thought of this sooner. It is the perfect solution! He normally wears an XL and the reviews suggested going up in size which we did. I ordered the 2x and the 3x. The 3x is perfect for his 230 lb, 6'2" frame. We will be enjoying our pool together over the Labor day weekend. Sweet!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Self

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable! Perfect for warm gulf diving!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I absolutely love this wetsuit! I bought the 2mm jacket and the matching 1.5mm pants. They are both very comfortable, and easy to put on. This suit is the perfect weight for warm Gulf diving! The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5, is I'm not sure how durable it will be. After my first two dives in it, I noticed some light signs of wear (pilling) on the jacket, from my BCD. I will update this review after I've had a chance to get a few more dives in it, and see if the pilling continues to get worse.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice Thin Neoprene Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 6' 230lb fatty. Fits great, looks good, easy to get on, and doesn't want to ride up on me. Neoprene is soft and somewhat stretchy. It might be 2mm, but feels thinner, just what I wanted. Shipped fast. I will use it with, and it looks good with them or board shorts. Looks like it's made well enough. I'll be using it heavily June 2018 and will update this review if it isn't holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Sizing too small
customer_reviews.text: The size comments are all over the board, leading me to believe the size label means nothing on this jacket. I’m 5’11”, 185 and the large seems two sizes too small. Could barely zip it and it’s all puckered, choking my throat. Sleeves are 2 inches too short. I’ll have to hope the XL is large enough. If not I’m done with this brand. Guess there’s a reason they don’t have a size chart!
customer_reviews.author: Brad B

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wetsuit jacket. It even worked as a life vest (good floatations device). Only down side: when falling into the water, the jacket rides up and does not stay down by my waist. I have to pull it down when in the water. Otherwise, it's warm and great feel and comfortable jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I used these 2mm neoprene wetsuit tops for snorkeling in the Sea of Cortez this month (December, 2019). We had been cautioned (via TripAdvisor) that the water was cool enough that snorkeling for more than 10 minutes (or so) would be uncomfortably cold. The advice was right on, but these wetsuit tops were just enough upper body insulation to keep us from getting chilled. I don't know about durability, but they seem well made and they really do the job. More stylish than I would have expected. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Smilodan

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmm, warm
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this for 8 days of diving in 78F water. With only a "dry-fit" t-shirt underneath and shorts, I was never uncomfortable. As a matter of fact, the one time that I jumped into the water for snorkeling with the kids without it, I immediately got our and put on my new top. It really made the difference. I don't think I could have made the dives without it. It dries quickly and was too warm to wear on the shore where the air temp was in the mid 80s. This saved my vacation.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great but lg perfect fit medium too small
customer_reviews.text: Great but lg perfect fit medium too small. I’m usually medium but fell in between. Large good with exception- large is made for big belly guys. I’m 155 lbs 5’9 and a trim 63 year old swimmer. These do not run true to size. Zipper is on wrong side normally female (American style) side.
customer_reviews.author: MG Mandell

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and well-priced wetsuit jacket. I was hedging between the small and the medium (5'9", 165 lbs with soccer player legs, 37" chest, 32" waist), and I am happy I chose the medium. Wetsuits work best at keeping you warm when a little tight. The small I purchased is as big as I would want a wetsuit jacket to be including few wrinkles here and there that I would generally try to avoid. With that in mind, you may want to buy one a little small if you like your wetsuit tight and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Leininger

customer_reviews.title: Way better than a shorty
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’1” and 200 lbs. I bought the large and it fits snug dry but loosens in the water. I would buy the same size if I was buying again. Used in in Hawaii for snorkeling. Loved the easy on/off, sun protection on my back and insulation. If I was using it everyday I’d invest in something more durable but this was great for limited use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: The product fit as expected and seems to be very well made and durable. It is comfortable to wear. The thickness is a little more than I expected, so it is a bit warmer than I needed, but that is not a big issue since it zips and that helps regulate the temperature. The fact that it zips instead of pulls over the head makes it WAY more desirable. I hate struggling putting on, but especially, taking off a wetsuit top.
customer_reviews.author: wintn

customer_reviews.title: Wont last with regular use
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'3" and 200lb, I bought an XL because reviewers said they ran small, I exchanged it for the L. Buy your size! After regular use over the summer surfing it needs replaced. I should have bought a better quality one as I need to replace this one so I lost out. If you only need this for a short time or wont use it much its good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Russ

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to protect my chest while i'm swimming with my dogs in the pool. Comfort is good my only concern I have is water seeps through around the neck area. If a velcro strap with near the neck area like my Quicksliver And Billbong wetsuit. this product would be rated 5stars
customer_reviews.author: Nate Porlas

customer_reviews.title: A Great Find After A Long Search
customer_reviews.text: After reading a couple of simalar reviews i ordered the 2xl wetsuit jacket. I'm 5ft6 with a bit of a gut, in a normal coat i wear 2xl so after much debate 2xl or 3xl for the wetsuit i chose 2xl knowing that amazon would exchange or refund. 2xl good choice Received about a week ago was ordered same day right after i received same brand 1.5 wetsuit pants also 2xl based on reviews as well Very pleased i use both to extend my pool time here in the Florida Winter and so far have worked very well for me. After use i rinse both in cold water and hang to dry indoors
customer_reviews.author: NORMAN V.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, kept me warm when I needed it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, kept me warm when I needed it. It does stretch a bit and gets a little lose when you are in the water.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: good for kayaking
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit jacket works for kayaking in 40 degree weather. I wear it with a t shirt under and a sweat shirt over and am comfortable. It would probably be important to have on if I were to go into the water.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lundberg

customer_reviews.title: excellent for those who swim in cold weather
customer_reviews.text: My dad who is already an older person, swims in a pool every morning and felt very cold when coming out of the water, with this suit now feels very comfortable, you do not need to be an athlete to use it, it is very practical.
customer_reviews.author: Graciela

customer_reviews.title: Keeping warm in the pool
customer_reviews.text: How did I not know about these types of jackets for my whole life?! This jacket enables me to enjoy water temperatures 10 degrees lower than my emotional threshold. It allowed me to stay in the water while my daughter learned how to swim.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Novoa

customer_reviews.title: Great for water exercise class!
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman, but Bought men’s large to wear for my outdoor water exercise class in Santa Cruz CA. Besides my bathing suit, I wear a long sleeve rashguard. Keeps me warm in the pool as well as when I walk out to the dressing room. AND it’s easy to zip up if I start the zipper above my stomach and then pull it down to finish zipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Diane Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I used this product twice now, one in the lake and one on the beach. On both location it performs very well. It keeps my body warm when I needed it to go fishing! Yes I used it for fishing under the wader.
customer_reviews.author: Sonnie

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and returned it because it was too small BUT the quality is great and the front zipper is just what I need. I reordered a much larger size. I really don’t like it too tight. (Just me). Great shirt. Even though I have not worn it in the water it feels like it will do the job for warmth. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie F

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’10” and 165lbs. This fits snug as advertised, I might have to Velcro down the sleeve openings to make it a bit more sealed up for snorkeling, but I am of a runners build and sort of anticipated this. Nice quality. Pleased w purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SFB

customer_reviews.title: Bit loose around the waist
customer_reviews.text: The designers could have stood to make these a little tighter around the waist. I expect they are trying to accommodate some heavier individuals, but at the expense of others.
customer_reviews.author: PamC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit . Lots of value
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect . Love it ! Better than my wetsuit . I’m 5’9 , 190lbs . 42-44 chest So worth the money 💰 Use it on my wave runner late in the year on lake st Clair
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a little extra warmth
customer_reviews.text: So much easier than putting on a wetsuit. I much prefer wearing this than my full or shorty wetsuit. Not as much warmth, but on some days it's all you need.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Gold

customer_reviews.title: Great water jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Good light duty wet suit top with a quality zipper. The fit was consistent with the size. We snorkeled in 79° water and I was comfortable for more than an hour. If you are in 80° (+/-) you will appreciate this top.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Not my size
customer_reviews.text: Tee product seemed like good quality, but the for was what forced us to return it. We are tall w long arms...this is made for smaller surfers.
customer_reviews.author: Christina T

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. I use this for kayaking and it's perfect. The zipper makes it useable in varying temperatures and it looks pretty cool as well.
customer_reviews.author: JLN

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic zipper
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how it performs because the cheap plastic zipper broke off when I was pulling the factory tag off right out of the box. A wetsuit that doesn’t close up in the front is pretty useless
customer_reviews.author: Longcast Joe

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm 175 lbs 5 10 and ordered a large. Fits real snug but comfortable. I should of ordered an xl but it making me want to loose a few lbs. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: clotilde s. palermo

customer_reviews.title: Kept me warm in cold water.
customer_reviews.text: For a reasonable price you get a decent occasional use wetsuit top. Used in a cold mountain river and was able to stay warm. Recommended for recreational use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small especially if you have a larger belly.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in great condition. Unfortunately we had to return it because it ran a lot smaller than we had thought. Absolutely no problems returning it. Really wish they had had a bigger size. Loved the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky D

customer_reviews.title: Great, for awhile...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my father in law to use at his cottage on a freshwater lake two months ago and the fabric attached to the neoprene on the neck has pulled away completely. Too bad, because he has enjoyed the warmth and sun protection it has offered. Unless Lemorecn is willing to stand behind the quality of their product, we won’t give them further business.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Worden

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive wetsuit jacket, reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive wetsuit jacket. My husband looks great in it and it fits him well. And, it was reasonably priced as compared to some other options that we were looking at. Plan to wear it for snorkeling, but haven't done so yet.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it fits my body. I swim at the Gym and sometimes the water temp can get cool. This wet suit jacket keeps me warm
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper on the left side??
customer_reviews.text: This said it was a male size, but the zipper is on the left side. Why is that? Definitely buy a size larger. I am 6'3 , 280lbs and wear XXL in everything. This XXXL was still almost too small. I would 100% return it for a 4X if it was avail. I am still debating the return mainly due to zipper placement and size issue. Everything else is good!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me
customer_reviews.text: I use this wetsuit when metal detecting in the water waist to chest deep. It keeps me comfortable and makes the experience much more enjoyable. I have since purchased the 3mm shorts. Well made , quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: works!
customer_reviews.text: work flawless! does keep you warm in 72 degree after few minute in cold water!
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff... hard to move.. like wearing a straight jacket
customer_reviews.author: mountaineer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shirt, husband works in it on the Red sea.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me warm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband as the local indoor pool is always cold. The large is a little big on him in a few areas but overall he is happy with it and it keeps him warm. He figured it is better having a wetsuit slightly large than uncomfortably small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Size on site appears to be off. I ordered a 2x which was tight. I returned if for a 3x which was easy and fast. Received it in just a few days. Very pleased with the customer service. Love my replacement jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D

customer_reviews.title: I went one size bigger and it fits great, so I would say they run small.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great seems to be well made I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this shirt. It's perfect for a cold day in the water
customer_reviews.author: A. Pellegrini

customer_reviews.title: I feel warm in this wetsuit.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8 with wide shoulders and as a woman I cannot find the right size in a wonen's wetsuit. I bought a men's wetsuit. It fits great and keeps my upper body warm in the California beach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review of Lemorech 2mm jacket
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is great but I purchased it too large at XXL. Should have ordered a XL. My error. Will still use it but it isn’t as warm as I would like. Excellent quality and value. I have another jacket in 3 mm XXL and it fits snugly. I overlooked the stretch in a 2mm.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Jones

customer_reviews.title: great price and great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for snorkeling in Aruba to protect me from the sun and keep me warm for an extended time in the water; this jacket was great and I will have it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: marcia c.

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to reviews
customer_reviews.text: I generally wear large in jackets but the reviews recommended XL. It’s a little long on the arm. It’s a little thinner than I thought it would be but for snorkeling in So. Cal it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: HLA

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: No problems with this. Well made. My husband just decided he wanted a shorty instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Nice wetsuit Jacket if you have small forearms.
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket, excellent construction and just right for the local indoor community pool (which is cold all winter), but the sleeves were so small I had to struggle to take it off. I ordered an XL and the body fit nicely, but the sleeves are 7 inches round at the opening and 10 inches at the forearm. Maybe I have unusual proportions, but as a scuba instructor for over 20 years, I think I know how a wetsuit is supposed to fit. Anyway, I'll probably just cut the sleeves shorter to remove the tight finishing strip at the opening.
customer_reviews.author: Mike OByrne

customer_reviews.title: Good purches
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a very good purchase. It fits well and seems to be made of durable material. It does the job and keeps me warm in a cold lake in late summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable and great price. Slightly big for my size when it is submerged.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Not half bad
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t that bad, it was kinda short around the wrist but it mostly did it’s job of keeping you warm in the after, I’ve been in a chlorine pool with it for a couple weeks now and there doesn’t seem to be any wear in it
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very poor fit and cheaply made. Not at all usable for waterskiing.
customer_reviews.author: M R Wegener

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get on and off. Love the zipper in front. Will be buying more of these as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald F. McClure

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: returned original and replaced with a larger size larger size than normal but it works well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great over my shorty for a little extra
customer_reviews.text: it fits. great over my shorty for a little extra warmth
customer_reviews.author: Rk

customer_reviews.title: Keep Warm in the Pool
customer_reviews.text: I wear this in the pool at the gym, because I get so cold I normally have to get out after 20 minutes. With this jacket, I can stay in the pool until everyone else is shivering, and I'm still working out! The fit is tight, but that is as it should be. You don't want cold water getting up inside.
customer_reviews.author: SeldenM

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I take an XL most clothing items but the 3XL seems to fit about right.
customer_reviews.author: BPD

customer_reviews.title: Really great wetsuit top
customer_reviews.text: Really great wetsuit top. I love it for swimming in Lake Michigan when water temps cool down and I don't feel like wearing a full wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: bigbandbeat

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my brother and it looks like a kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my brother and it looks like a kids. It was way too small so not sure how quality was, he sent back.
customer_reviews.author: minecraft is awesome

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove, very comfortable! The blue coloring on the jacket bled into the inside of my kayaking jacket. Besides that it was a dope jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan l.

product_meta.title: Lemorecn Men’s 2mm Wetsuits Jacket Long Sleeve Neoprene Wetsuits Top
feature_bullets: MULTI-USE: Designed to keep you warm in the coldest conditions for diving, paddleboarding, kiteboarding, wakeboarding, kayaking, canoeing and other water sports.
DURABILITY: Spot taped at stress points and flatlock seams provide a smooth interior and exterior surface to ensure maximum comfort and durability.
ZIPPER: Heavy duty YKK Front zipper is designed to allows for easy entry and exit

Three layers of diving fabrics, the outer is imported nylon fabric, it is high elastic and durable; the middle insulation is neoprene, it is high scalability, waterproof and heat insulation; soft close skin heating to keep warm,it is close skin and comfortable soft warm

Excellent production technology, the use of classic Crewneck design, protect the neck from scrape the zipper, the suture technique of fold, more personal. Greatly improve comfort and thermal performance
